cast.original_title: Jack et la mécanique du cœur
cast.overview: In Scotland 1874, Jack is born on the coldest day ever. Because of the extreme cold, his heart stops beating. The responsible midwife in Edinburgh finds a way to save him by replacing his heart with a clock. So he lives and remains under the midwife's protective care. But he must not get angry or excited because that endangers his life by causing his clock to stop working. Worse than that, when he grows up, he has to face the fact he cannot fall in love because that too could stop his delicate heart.
cast.title: Jack and the Cuckoo-Clock Heart

details.biography:
Mathias Malzieu (born 1974) is the lead singer of the French band Dionysos, which he co-founded in 1993 when he lived in Valence in Drôme (Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes). Three of his schoolfriends, Eric Serra Tosio, Michael Ponton and Guillaume Garidel, were among the band's original members.

Malzieu has written the following books: 38 mini westerns avec des fantômes (2002); Maintenant qu'il fait tout le temps nuit sur toi (2005); La mécanique du cœur (2007), English translation titled The Boy with the Cuckoo-Clock Heart released in September 2009; Métamorphose en bord de ciel (2011); Le Plus Petit Baiser Jamais Recensé (2013); Journal d'un vampire en pyjama (2016), English translation titled Diary of a Vampire in Pyjamas released in May 2017; Une sirène à Paris; Le dérèglement joyeux de la métrique amoureuse.

With Stephanie Berla, he directed Jack and the Cuckoo-Clock Heart, for which Dionysos composed music and in which he voiced Jack, and A Mermaid in Paris.

Malzieu's partner as of 2019 is Daria Nelson, a French photographer.

Source: Article "Mathias Malzieu" from Wikipedia in English, licensed under CC-BY-SA 3.0.
details.name: Mathias Malzieu
